page.title: 01SIBLE HEDINGHAM GAZETTEER
page.content: {Sible Hedingham}is a large village in North Essex with a population of about 3650.It is mostly rural but there are housing estates,shops, {industry}and schools.There is easy access to other places because of the A604 and a{local bus service.} The village is surrounded by arable fields and open countryside.The River Colne flows along the east side with an old water mill. The old airfield is sometimes used to test cars;nearby is an electricity sub_station.The American Airforce use the airbase at Wethersfield 4 kilometer west;sometimes aircraft fly very low over the village. We are{self_sufficient}having a comprehensive school,some{public {services,churches and clubs.} It is a friendly and pleasant neighbourhood.
